document.heading: Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1982 Act of 1981

history.narrative: Law 4-51, the “Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1982 Act of 1981,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-292, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 28, 1981 and September 15, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on September 25, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-88 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
